disableSecondFactorDialog.message: Use your Google Authenticator app to scan the QR code and complete the deactivation.

qrStep.description: Or copy and paste this key manually into your app:

codeStep.description: Enter the code generated in your app to complete the process.

privateKeyCard.note: Note: the key is masked for security. Viewing it will require a second factor.
